name: Unicorn Cleans House
description:
The underside of Unicorn’s couch is infested with dust bunnies! Take control of the magical mammal and help it clean up in an aggressive fashion... by shrinking down and kicking dust bunnies in the face! A short and sweet platformer played with your keyboard.

Game Controls:
Move: Left and Right Arrow Keys
Jump: Spacebar OR Up Arrow Key
Kick: 'B' OR Down Arrow Key

There will be updates to come and I'm open to feedback.
